title: Fire at a high-rise in Borella, Fire-wood stove cause for the blaze
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A fire broke out in a house on the 10th floor of the Sahaspura apartment complex in Wanathamulla, Borella yesterday (25) due to the use of firewood stove inside the premises instead of gas.
Residents said they were compelled to use firewood due to the lack of gas for several days.
News 1st Correspondent said that people in many other houses in this housing scheme have also been tempted to use firewood.
